channel.title: Rights?
channel.description: Ok so I've made my server probably 3 weeks ago, and if you all know, the allstar scape source says "Owner & Coder _______ has logged in" when a owner logs in, but I am the acually the coder and owner but my co owner has the same saying, even though he doesn't code! So how can I make it say Co Owner ____ has logged in, or even create a new player right for co owner.

item.title: Rights?
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

Either do what deathchaos said or change it so when he logs in it says whatever you want… In login.java you should be able to customize what it says. Where it say if playername logs in and p.rights = blank add a sM so it tells exactly what he is… If you still have probs message me

Read full topic

item.title: Rights?
item.dc:creator: @thefuck thefuck
item.description:
@thefuck wrote:

mikeandike:

what base are you using

lolacost, reread his post.

Read full topic

item.title: Rights?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Rather than having it dependent on the players rights, have it dependent on the players name.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) // Your message if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("HisName")) // His message

Read full topic
